experience.title: CEO
experience.description: Maitri Capital was launched to bridge the gap between institutional and native crypto investors. The infrastructure in place enabled traditional investors to feel comfortable acquiring digital assets given the firm’s policies and procedures which mirrored that of traditional investment processes. Compliance, Risk Frameworks, Pre/Post Trade Analytics, Custody, Insurance and Regulation.Foundational role from a blank sheet of paper through to strategic planning and execution. I covered every role within the organization before the team build-out. Extremely hands-on and detail-orientated.
